channel.title: Cape Animations
channel.description: I want to add the 120 capes to my server but when I did, they don't move and they overlap the person. Any ideas on how to fix this? I also want to add animations, because the cape is lifeless. [img]http://i58.tinypic.com/2rqg8ow.png[/img] [img]http://i58.tinypic.com/9j3or6.png[/img]
